document_data.name: Izzy
document_data.mainbody:
'''Izzy''' was a child who lived in the [[Rivington]] district of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''We're gonna see the mummy, the dryad, the djinni - everything! So don't even think about trying to stop us.''|Izzy}}
document_data.Description: She was a spirited [[human]] youth with pale skin, chestnut eyes and reddish-brown hair.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the famed [[Circus of the Last Days]] returned to the city of Baldur's Gate. Izzy and her friend [[Mavus]] were curious about the wondrous creatures that the circus brought to Rivington. Izzy cared not for what adults had to say, and she was dead set on getting into the circus. Izzy and Mavus were trying to peep inside and vault over the circus walls to get inside.
